document_data.caption: Sardonyx helmet shell cameo.
document_data.name: Sardonyx Helmet
document_data.mainbody: '''Sardonyx helmet''' was a [[wikipedia:en:cassidae|cassidae]] shell found in the Realms.
document_data.Description: Helmet shells were sought after for making cameos. Sardonyx helmet shells were named for the [[sardonyx]]-like appearance of cameos made from these shells. The reddish brown layer beneath a lighter colored layer mimicked the appearance of the [[gem|gemstone]]. A large specimen in good condition had a base value of 40 gp.
